about_the_game:
Game Features：

*Searching for the "Soul Fragments of Cats" hidden in the Story Mode to Save the Kitten

*Explore interactive NPCs in story mode, collect items to complete commissioned tasks

*Warm and healing style with colorful and thick hand-painted style, with hidden Easter eggs

Hmm?! Who said my cat's nine lifespans have come to an end? This is definitely a miscalculation by the math poor cat Dis!

Don't say such words again in the future, the kitten can't hear them. Alright, Benmao is going to eat canned food, this is a new flavor launched at the promotion festival! As for that silly cat Dis - hahaha, you can catch me first and then talk about it!

 

In this game, you can mainly search for the soul fragments of cats in different scenes, meet NPCs with different needs and problems, and help them collect more items while completing the collection of cat souls; If you can't find it, you can use the "magnifying glass" function to search for hidden and more secretive items

（1）Main quest: Embark on an adventure with a kitten, searching for soul fragments hidden in different spaces

You need to search for the soul fragments of the kitten in nine different scenes. It may be hidden anywhere, please search carefully (if you can't find it, you can also use the support of a magnifying glass)

 

（2）Entrusted task: Unlock different stories and complete side quests by interacting with NPCs with vastly different personalities during the journey

In each chapter's scene diagram, we will have three NPCs to interact with after clicking. Understand their needs and help them find lost or desired items in the scene~Let's search together!

 

（3）Unique painting style: healing thick painted hand-painted style full of gorgeous colors

That's great! It's a familiar art style! The super healing style of thick painted hand-painted style, with beautiful colors. While playing the game, you can also enjoy different scenery within the scene~
detailed_description:
Game Features：

*Searching for the "Soul Fragments of Cats" hidden in the Story Mode to Save the Kitten

*Explore interactive NPCs in story mode, collect items to complete commissioned tasks

*Warm and healing style with colorful and thick hand-painted style, with hidden Easter eggs

Hmm?! Who said my cat's nine lifespans have come to an end? This is definitely a miscalculation by the math poor cat Dis!

Don't say such words again in the future, the kitten can't hear them. Alright, Benmao is going to eat canned food, this is a new flavor launched at the promotion festival! As for that silly cat Dis - hahaha, you can catch me first and then talk about it!

 

In this game, you can mainly search for the soul fragments of cats in different scenes, meet NPCs with different needs and problems, and help them collect more items while completing the collection of cat souls; If you can't find it, you can use the "magnifying glass" function to search for hidden and more secretive items

（1）Main quest: Embark on an adventure with a kitten, searching for soul fragments hidden in different spaces

You need to search for the soul fragments of the kitten in nine different scenes. It may be hidden anywhere, please search carefully (if you can't find it, you can also use the support of a magnifying glass)

 

（2）Entrusted task: Unlock different stories and complete side quests by interacting with NPCs with vastly different personalities during the journey

In each chapter's scene diagram, we will have three NPCs to interact with after clicking. Understand their needs and help them find lost or desired items in the scene~Let's search together!

 

（3）Unique painting style: healing thick painted hand-painted style full of gorgeous colors

That's great! It's a familiar art style! The super healing style of thick painted hand-painted style, with beautiful colors. While playing the game, you can also enjoy different scenery within the scene~

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.14+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

movies.name: 《迷途猫的灵魂碎片》玩法展示

name: Stray of Lost Cat Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP,Vista,7,8/8.1,10
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory,capable of OpenGL 3.0+support（2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable）
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP,Vista,7,8/8.1,10
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory,capable of OpenGL 3.0+support（2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable）
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to"Stray of Lost Cat", where your mission is to save a quirky little cat. How to escape the pursuit of "Meowdis" and collect soul fragments scattered in different areas, this will be a leisurely and healing adventure journey~
